name: WildFire
description: This app supports executing investigative actions like 'detonate file' to analyze file on the WildFire sandbox.

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity. This action logs into the device to check the connection and credentials.
Run the file in the WildFire sandbox and retrieve the analysis results.
actions.verbose:
This action requires the input file to be present in the vault and therefore takes the vault id as the input parameter.
Currently the sandbox supports the following file types:
  • PE
  • PDF
  • Flash
  • APK
  • JAR/Class
  • MS Office files like doc, xls and ppt

vault_id.description: Vault ID of file to detonate

file_name.verbose: This value will be passed to the sandbox as the name of the file that is pickup up from the vault

actions.description: Query for results of an already completed detonation in WildFire.
actions.verbose: Each detonation report in WildFire is denoted by the sha256 and md5 of the file.

id.description: File MD5 or Sha256 to get the results of

actions.description: Download a sample from WildFire and add it to the vault.
actions.verbose: Do note that WildFire does not generally store samples that have been uploaded for detonation.

actions.description: Download the pcap file of a sample from WildFire and add it to the vault.

hash.description: Hash of file/sample to download pcap of

platform.description: Platform of file/sample to download pcap of

actions.description: Save a PDF of the detonation report to the Vault.

id.description: File MD5 or Sha256 to get the results of
